backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining agents, leads, owners, follow‑ups, user profiles, and approval logic with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing themed UI changes, affected files, involved components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to brief human‑written summaries of their purpose and styling version.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme token definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and bootstrapping the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup with protected, admin, and agent route guards and dashboard routing logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgentRegist: Agent registration dialog handling form input, photo upload, validation, and submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main layout with header, role-based theming, logout handling, and footer for all pages.
Applies a page-level CSS theme class based on the given variant.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Renders a WhatsApp button that opens a prefilled chat message to a specified mobile number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, agents, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and page-level theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays themed access denial messages with reason-specific details and a logout option.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides the admin dashboard layout with tabbed panels for overview, agents, data, follow-ups, and export tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AgentDetailPage: Displays detailed agent information, status, and lead performance with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/AdminOve: Shows admin metrics such as leads, agents, revenue, and follow-ups, including charts and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/AgentMan: Allows admins to view, create, and manage agent accounts, including status updates and photo uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/ExportCe: Exports agents, leads, and owner data to CSV or Excel using utility download functions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/GlobalFo: Displays all follow-ups segmented into pending, overdue, and completed with filtering, status badges, and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/panels/MasterDa: Provides CRUD management for leads and owners with tabs, dialogs, and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/agent/AgentDashboardP: Renders the agent dashboard with tabs for overview, lead/owner creation, and follow-up tracking.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/AddLeadO: Allows agents to create leads and owners and view their own lead and owner lists.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/AgentOve: Shows agent-specific metrics including counts of leads, owners, and today's follow-ups with loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/agent/panels/FollowUp: Enables agents to view, create, and edit follow-ups with forms, dialogs, and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login via Internet Identity, profile setup, and routing based on admin or agent roles.
frontend/src/utils/downloads.ts: Provides CSV and Excel file download utilities that generate files from array data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines TailwindCSS config with custom colors, radius, shadows, dark mode, and animation/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature summaries, architecture notes, and current state for a VR Homes CRM system.
